meanings.definition: (informal) Shortened form of the name Whiffenpoofs, a senior a cappella singing group at Yale University.
meanings.english_definition: (informal) A shortened form of the name of the Whiffenpoofs, a senior a cappella singing group at Yale University.
examples: He auditioned for the Whiffen his senior year.

etymology.value: Derived from the Middle English personal name 'Whiffin', which is of uncertain origin, possibly a diminutive of a Germanic personal name.
